casebody.data:
John H. MORLEY, Jr., Petitioner
v.
Lawrence M. FARNESE, Jr., Kevin Michael Greenberg, George J. Farrell, Gaetano Piccirilli, Michael Weiss and Karen Greenberg, Respondents No. 80 EAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. August 7, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 7th day of August, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal and Motion to Strike Answer to Petition for Allowance of Appeal are DENIED.
